message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product we're discussing is not just an item but a valuable asset that has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. Given its unique features and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the high quality and the rarity of this product, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects its true worth and the investment it represents. I trust that you will find the value proposition compelling and look forward to your positive response.
